comments: Creates a new permission for an entity type. You must specify the id of the entity type you are creating the permission for.
You can optionally specify an Id for the permission inside the EntityTypePermission object itself, if not provided one will be generated.

params.name: entityTypeId
comments: The Id of the entity type to create the permission on.

params.name: permissionId
comments: (Optional) The Id of the permission. If not provided a secure random UUID will be generated.

params.name: request
comments: The request object that contains all of the information used to create the permission.
